dimensions.name: Compute & Chips Dependence
dimensions.description: Measures reliance on specific hardware vendors and supply chain vulnerabilities

dimensions.name: Cloud Concentration
dimensions.description: Measures dependency on hyperscaler partnerships and infrastructure lock-in

dimensions.name: Policy & Geopolitical Exposure
dimensions.description: Measures sensitivity to regulatory action, export controls, and political shifts

dimensions.name: Demand & Commercialization
dimensions.description: Measures revenue sustainability, customer concentration, and market position

dimensions.name: Resilience Moves
dimensions.description: Measures proactive risk mitigation, diversification, and strategic hedging

checklist_items.name: Single GPU Vendor Lock-in
checklist_items.description: Evidence of tight coupling to a single GPU vendor (e.g., NVIDIA-only strategy)

checklist_items.name: Supply Constraints Impact
checklist_items.description: Evidence of supply constraints or delivery risk impacting roadmap

checklist_items.name: Single Hyperscaler Dependence
checklist_items.description: Primary dependence on one hyperscaler for training/inference infrastructure

checklist_items.name: Platform Lock-in Signals
checklist_items.description: Switching costs, exclusivity signals, or deep integration with single provider

checklist_items.name: Export Control Exposure
checklist_items.description: Exposure to export controls or cross-border restrictions affecting compute/chips

checklist_items.name: Regulatory Sensitivity
checklist_items.description: High sensitivity to regulatory action (antitrust, safety regulation, procurement bans)

checklist_items.name: Demand Weakness Signals
checklist_items.description: Credible signals of demand weakness or monetization challenges

checklist_items.name: Capex/Opex Overhang
checklist_items.description: Evidence of capex/opex overhang relative to adoption (overbuild, runway strain)

checklist_items.name: Multi-sourcing Demonstrated
checklist_items.description: Demonstrated multi-sourcing or diversification (multi-cloud, alternative accelerators)

checklist_items.name: Risk Reduction Actions
checklist_items.description: Concrete risk-reduction actions (long-term contracts, redundancy, modular deployment)
